Detective.description:
Higher perception for finding clues/hazards.
Skeptical, but capable of seeing signs others miss.

observations.inter_level_thought: The pattern is becoming clear; I can feel it in my gut. This isn't just a coincidence.

EMT.description: More base health, strength and medical knowledge.

observations.inter_level_thought: I can feel the adrenaline coursing through my veins. This is what I was trained for, and now I'll use my skills to keep myself alive.

Journalist.description: Sure does take some good notes? IDK just a regular person.

observations.inter_level_thought: I can't shake the feeling that something terrible is about to happen. I need to stay alert.

Medium.description:
Higher intuition for hazard warnings.
Think Clear Rivers at the end of FD1 before she got all bitchy.

observations.inter_level_thought: Why do I feel like I'm being watched? Something's not right here.
